company_description: Payhawk is a fintech company that offers expense management and corporate card solutions for businesses, helping them streamline their financial operations and control expenses.
founders: Boyko Karadzhov, Hristo Borisov, Konstantin Dzhengozov
seed_investors: Eleven Ventures, Tiny VC, Earlybird VC
universities: Sofia University St. Kliment Ohridski, American University in Bulgaria
embedding_text: Payhawk is a fintech company that offers expense management and corporate card solutions for businesses, helping them streamline their financial operations and control expenses.
